channel.title: Original features vs. Emulation
channel.description:
I'm going to develop a RS2 server (I always say this and end up abandoning those projects) and I need to gather your opinions on private servers. What would you like to see on a server? Original features? Features from RuneScape? Or a combination of both?
Also, may I ask: what is the best experience rates for a server so that skilling won't be too boring (too hard or too easy)?
Thanks. :)

item.title: Original features vs. Emulation
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Like said before me, I like RS features, but with faster exp, and maybe custom minigames.

Read full topic

item.title: Original features vs. Emulation
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

Errorist:

Make a decent RS2 replica and once you have over 300 players switch to an RSC source.

No. No RS2 replica will ever be good (or RSC server).

Make a unique server, with all working skills.

Read full topic

item.title: Original features vs. Emulation
item.dc:creator: @0bbyme 0bbyme
item.description:
@0bbyme wrote:

just do a rs2 remake x3 exp, add some extra features to make people log in and stay. that seems to be the only problem on rs2 remakes.

Read full topic

item.title: Original features vs. Emulation
item.dc:creator: @whip_of_soulz whip of soulz
item.description:
@whip_of_soulz wrote:

[quote=“Rixxx, post:11, topic:362035”][quote author=whip of soulz link=topic=458311.msg3353844#msg3353844 date=1285604180]

I’m going to develop a RS2 server (I always say this and end up abandoning those projects) and I need to gather your opinions on private servers. What would you like to see on a server? Original features? Features from RuneScape? Or a combination of both?

Also, may I ask: what is the best experience rates for a server so that skilling won’t be too boring (too hard or too easy)?

Thanks.
[/quote]Will it be a pking server?

I have not decided at the moment. What is so good about a PK server?

I always enjoyed ragnarok private servers because its was generally the same game only slight differences. Why not just set 4x or 8x exp rates and focus on original content that actually works correctly?

I wouldn’t want to set such an extremely low experience rate. Do you mean original content in minigames or skills?

remake rs as good as u can then work on w/e else u wanna add

I played RS from 2005-2006 (or '07) as a free player. I don’t know what to remake.

Either have a really good remake with fast training, or do something way different with customs and custom minigames

I wouldn’t want to see players maxed out within a month of playing. I hate custom items, but custom minigames are a good idea.

Bump![/quote]
It makes it easier for us if you know what server you want to make + from what I’ve seen pking servers get more players.

Read full topic

item.title: Original features vs. Emulation
item.dc:creator: @Rixxx Rix_
item.description:
@Rixxx wrote:

[quote=“whip of soulz, post:3, topic:362035”][quote author=Rixxx link=topic=458311.msg3353719#msg3353719 date=1285588514]
I’m going to develop a RS2 server (I always say this and end up abandoning those projects) and I need to gather your opinions on private servers. What would you like to see on a server? Original features? Features from RuneScape? Or a combination of both?

Also, may I ask: what is the best experience rates for a server so that skilling won’t be too boring (too hard or too easy)?

Thanks.
[/quote]Will it be a pking server?[/quote]
I have not decided at the moment. What is so good about a PK server?

Miss Silabsoft:

I always enjoyed ragnarok private servers because its was generally the same game only slight differences. Why not just set 4x or 8x exp rates and focus on original content that actually works correctly?

I wouldn’t want to set such an extremely low experience rate. Do you mean original content in minigames or skills?

noobs are ftw:

remake rs as good as u can then work on w/e else u wanna add

I played RS from 2005-2006 (or '07) as a free player. I don’t know what to remake.

marcbob:

Either have a really good remake with fast training, or do something way different with customs and custom minigames

I wouldn’t want to see players maxed out within a month of playing. I hate custom items, but custom minigames are a good idea.

Bump!

Read full topic

item.title: Original features vs. Emulation
item.dc:creator: @justinxg27 justinxg27
item.description:
@justinxg27 wrote:

[quote=“Miss Silabsoft, post:4, topic:362035”]I always enjoyed ragnarok private servers because its was generally the same game only slight differences. Why not just set 4x or 8x exp rates and focus on original content that actually works correctly?[/quote]Lol :P, There were tonnes of private servers for ragnarok when it was p2p and yeah they were pretty much the game itself with small changes.

item.title: Original features vs. Emulation
item.dc:creator: @Sir_Lethal1 Sir Lethal_
item.description:
@Sir_Lethal1 wrote:

I have to say combining them both seem to make the best server.
Emulation in some parts + some original features of your own so that your server can seem “unique” from the tons of p.i leech’s ect.

Read full topic
